channel.title: Help with clan name not allowed !#$%^&*()
channel.description:
so first i tryed this,
[code]public static CharSequence invalidCharacters = "!, £, $, %, ^, &, *, (, ), [, ], {, }, @, #, ~";[/code]
Still let have the $ ect,
So i tierd this,
[code]if(clanname.contains("!") || clanname.contains("£") || clanname.contains("$")) {[/code]
The £ worked, but not the others..
I aslo have [code]if(clanname.contains(ClanSystem.invalidCharacters)) {[/code]
so how would i get it so when creating a clan, they can not use, !@#$%^&*()_+?"{{: Ect
Thanks for looking
